Uses of Class
models.monsters.Hero

  • Packages that use Hero 
    Package Description
    controllers  

    • Uses of Hero in controllers

      Fields in controllers declared as Hero 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Hero[] GameMaster.players
      this is the collection of players in the current game session.
      Methods in controllers that return Hero 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private Hero GameMaster.rollHero()
      generates a hero based on randomly rolled attributes.
      private Hero GameMaster.setUpHero()
      this method sets a heros name of a randomly generated hero that has been approved by the user.
      Methods in controllers with parameters of type Hero 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private void GameMaster.displayTurnInfo(Hero player)
      this method takes in a player and outputs their name and current state and also prints out the opponent monsters state
      private void GameMaster.monsterTurn(Hero player)
      this takes in a target player and performs an attack for the monster based on certain conditions.
      private void GameMaster.performAction(Hero player, TurnAction action)
      this method take in a player and action and does the requested action.
      private void GameMaster.playerTurn(Hero player)
      this method performs a turn for the player passed in.
      private java.lang.String GameMaster.playerUsePotion(Hero player, Type type)
      this method uses a potion and creates an output string based on how much it restored the specified stat.
      private void GameMaster.turnOfCombat(Hero player)
      this method runs a turn of combat based on a single player.
